name: Simple Regenerate Slug
author: Patel Sunny

sections.description:
Regenerate Slugs From Title of Posts, Page Title, Custom Post Title.

Kindly let us know your feedback or comments to add more features in this plugin.

Support

If you believe you have found a security vulnerability on Simple Regenerate Slug plugin, we encourage you to let us know right away.
You can submit bugs here

When opening a bug on GitHub, please give us as many details as possible.

  • Symptoms of your problem
  • Screenshot, if possible
  • Your website URL
  • Current version of WordPress, PHP
sections.installation:
1.Log in to your WordPress admin panel and go to Plugins -> Add New
2.Type Simple Regenerate Slug in the search box and click on search button.
3.Find Simple Regenerate Slug plugin.
4.Then click on Install Now after that activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
How to configure simple regenerate slug plugin?

Find Simple Regenerate Slug plugin.
Then click on Install Now after that activate the plugin.
